item.title: Developing Secure Applications
item.description: Everyday there is a new story about a hacking incident somewhere, developing secure applications is definitely one of the most important challenges in the software world. A good analogy is the defence of a castle, in the medieval world castles were very important. In a anarchic world with many threads they were the centres of power and stability. But how to defend a castle from your enemyâ€™s ? a well built castle in a high point was a clear advantage, will a relatively small force it could be defended against a much powerful enemy.
